text: On April 1, 2017, Exempt Organizations Special Review underwent a reorganization and was transplanted to Compliance, Planning & Classiﬁcation, Issue Identiﬁcation and Special Review. In addition, Compliance, Planning & Classiﬁcation assumed ownership of this manual.

New IRM 4.70.7, TE/GE Examinations, Special Review (SR) and Tax Exempt Quality Measurement System (TEQMS) Procedures, supersedes this manual, rendering this manual obsolete. Please see the new manual for all directions concerning special review for exempt organizations.
Tax Exempt and Government Entities Compliance, Planning & Classiﬁcation Issue Identiﬁcation and Special Review
Director Compliance, Planning & Classiﬁcation Government Entities and Shared Tax Exempt and Government Entities
